meanings.definition: A person who drives a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The bus driver safely took the children to school.
meanings.sent2: The taxi driver picked up passengers at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The driver waved at the pedestrians waiting to cross the street.
meanings.sent4: She was the driver of change in the community, always leading new initiatives.
meanings.sent5: The truck driver navigated through the stormy weather with skill and caution.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to insert or remove screws.
meanings.sent1: He used a screwdriver to tighten the loose screws on the chair.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic reached for the electric driver to speed up the repair process.
meanings.sent3: The driver slipped from his hand and fell into the toolbox with a clatter.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a powerful driver, pushing him to take action.
meanings.sent5: The precision driver made the task of assembling the furniture quick and easy.

meanings.definition: A program that controls a specific type of hardware device.
meanings.sent1: The printer driver ensured the document was printed correctly.
meanings.sent2: He installed the latest driver for the graphics card to improve performance.
meanings.sent3: The driver update notification popped up on the screen at the most inconvenient time.
meanings.sent4: The software acted as a silent driver, enabling seamless communication between devices.
meanings.sent5: The driver allowed the webcam to capture clear images for the video call.
